item.description:
Local food goes global! Join us for Global Food workshop and learn to make delicious, healthy recipes from around the world with vegetables from your garden. This fun,participatory workshop (12:00 PM-1:00PM) will be hosted during the 2nd Annual Nightingale Harvest Festival (10:00 a.m. â€“ 3:00 p.m.).

Get ready for music,fresh harvests, and delicious food!

This event is part of Tastes of the Garden cooking workshop series hosted by BNAN. The workshop is free and open to the public. Please call 617-542-7696 or email info@bostonnatural.org for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: Nightingale community Garden is 13 min walk from Shawmut MBTA station and 2 min walk from Washington St@Park St MBTA bus stop. Street parking is available.
item.name: Global Food
